  •   A PERFECT MULTI SURFACE CLEAN – Proclean Premium Flat Mop is crafted to deep clean all hard floor types with ease. No matter the surface, whether it be laminate, tiles, wood, vinyl or stone, your floors will never have looked better. Engineered with a low profile design, this makes sure you can get to those notoriously hard to reach areas. No spillage or sticky floor is a match for your new mop!
  •  INCLUDES 2 REUSABLE PADS – Every mop set comes with 2 ultra-absorbent reusable microfiber mop pads. They’re  machine washable, we recommend washing at Replacements are also available .

Excellent Design  : The narrow bottle brushes feature a long handle, non-slip grip, and soft silicone bristles which will effectively and easily clean all the corners, nooks, and crannies of your bottles and containers without leaving any residue or scratches on the surfaces.
Quality Material  : These water bottle brushes are made from silicone material. Free food-grade silicone bottle brushes, free of pollution, and absolutely environmental protection. The cleaning is drier and quieter.
Durable And Practical : Compare with traditional nylon brush, silicone bottle brush will keep their shape for a longer time, it is very durable and does not easy to break off and fall apart, They can even be used for hot cleaning.
Grime Free And Scratch Safe : The soft, flexible silicone bristles of our water bottle cleaning brush are tough on gunk, yet gentle enough to leave your favorite vase, glass water bottle, pitcher, blender, and glassware clean and scratch-free.
Use  : You can use our silicone bottle cleaning brushes set for narrow bottles || baby bottles || gallon water bottles || manna water bottles || vases || mugs || glassware || or even dish. Silicone brushes are way more efficient and durable cleaning tools than sponge || plastic || or straw brushes.
Multipurpose Cleaning  : Silicone brushes are way more efficient and durable cleaning tools than sponge, plastic, or straw brushes. You can use our silicone bottle cleaning brushes set for narrow bottles, baby bottles, gallon water bottles, manna water bottles, vases, mugs, glassware, or even dish.

data.p_description:
Regular ROTARY MOP

EASY TO USE – This spin mop with a bucket has a spinner section with a bucket for wringing it out. Flipping the mop handle to “on” will allow you to use the handle-driven spin features of this mop. Put spin mop on top of the bucket agitator keeping the handle straight and pushing the handle down to activate spinning the mop head. It will wring the mop out fast and easy

FLEXIBLE MOP HEAD FOR DEEP CLEANING – Designed with 360-degree rotation so that mop head can easily maneuver and fit under furniture and into corners. The lock allows you to extend up to a clean window. The most important thing is that you could angle the mop head easily by placing your foot on the mop head and tip the handle up or down to the desired angle

DURABLE FOR EVERYDAY USE – Our spin mop bucket with wringer is STAINLESS STEEL. spin mop bucket system includes total of 2 microfiber spin mop replacement heads. Spin mop refills heads are durable and machine washable, with better value than cotton mops. Microfiber spin mop effectively gathers and holds dust, grit, and grime. Perfect for home, kitchen, bathroom, office, corner cleaning.

PERFECT FOR ALL FLOOR – No spills, no shock, and no damage to floors; Microfiber mop heads work great welter dry keeping hands free of dirt and debris.

data.p_name: Proclean Wall Hanging TPR Toilet Brush
data.p_description:
Wall Hanging TPR Toilet Brush

  • [Silicone brush head] Soft TPR, silicone bristles have good cleaning ability, can enter the edge of the toilet seat, deep clean, will not damage the porcelain glaze.
  • [Base] The PP thickened base material is strong and will not tip over, and it can also be hung on the wall. There is a vent at the bottom and there will be no accumulation of water underneath. It can dry quickly and maintain hygiene more effectively.
  • [Slip-proof and rust-proof handle] Durable PP handle with good grip. Just one touch, you can perfectly clean new stains.
  • [Good concealment] The compact toilet brush is suitable for toilets or sinks in narrow spaces. There is tape on the side of the toilet brush holder, which can be hung on the wall to save space. Good helper in the bathroom.
  • [Clean dead corners]: The toilet brush is not only strong, but also tougher. The bendable brush head can clean all areas inside the toilet, especially the grooves.

  • [Multi-purpose]: The toilet brush can reach any corner, especially for cleaning the edge of the toilet lid, the small gap between the toilet and the wall, and the toilet groove. It is very suitable for use in family bathrooms, hotels, hospitals, offices and schools, etc.

 • Easier to clean dead corner
 • Bendable brush head

 • Protect the toilet bowl from being scratched

data.p_name: Riyon Combo Offer (Detergent Powder 1kg,  Diabetics Toothpaste 100g,  Beauty Soap 100g, Liquid Dish Wash 500ml, Toilet Cleaner 750ml, Shampoo 170ml, Liquid Blue 100ml with Free Container)
data.p_description:
Get the ultimate household essentials in one convenient package with the Riyon Combo Offer! This all-in-one set includes:

Riyon Detergent Powder (1kg) – Powerful stain removal for bright, fresh clothes.
Riyon Diabetics Toothpaste (100g) – Specially formulated for diabetic oral care.
Riyon Beauty Soap (100g) – Gentle on skin, leaving it soft and refreshed.
Riyon Liquid Dish Wash (500ml) – Tough on grease, mild on hands.
Riyon Toilet Cleaner (750ml) – Deep cleaning for a germ-free toilet.
Riyon Shampoo (170ml) – Nourishing formula for healthy, shiny hair.
Riyon Liquid Blue (100ml) – Keeps your whites brighter than ever.
Free Container – Perfect for storing your essentials!

A must-have combo for every home! Get yours today and experience the best in quality and value.
